rook.core.io.proxy

Class IOListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • rook.core.io.proxy.IOListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IOInputs, IOOutputs

    public abstract class IOListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Listens for BroadcastMessages on the given RID group. These messages are parsed as IOValues and dispatched to registered listeners accordingly.
    Author:
    Eric Thill
